name: Find all Synchronization accounts possibly used for Entra ID Connect

queryList.query: MATCH (account) WHERE (account:User OR account:AZUser) AND (account.name =~ '(?i)^MSOL_|.*AADConnect.*' OR account.userprincipalname =~ '(?i)^sync_.*') RETURN account

name: Find all hybrid users with an active Tier-0 Entra role

queryList.query: MATCH (onprem_user) WHERE (onprem_user.onpremisesyncenabled = true) MATCH (entra_roles_t0) WHERE (entra_roles_t0.displayname =~ '(?i)_VAR_all-entra-roles-in-t0') MATCH p = (onprem_user)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..5]->(entra_roles_t0) RETURN p

name: Find all hybrid users with an active Tier-1 Entra role

queryList.query: MATCH (onprem_user) WHERE (onprem_user.onpremisesyncenabled = true) MATCH (entra_roles_t1) WHERE (entra_roles_t1.displayname =~ '(?i)_VAR_all-entra-roles-in-t1') MATCH p = (onprem_user)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..5]->(entra_roles_t1) RETURN p

name: Find all hybrid users with an active Azure role

queryList.query: MATCH (onprem_user) WHERE (onprem_user.onpremisesyncenabled = true) MATCH (all_az_scopes) WHERE (all_az_scopes:_VAR_all-az-scopes) MATCH p = (onprem_user)-[r]->(all_az_scopes) RETURN p
